body.name: USB C Hub, Acodot 9 in 1 USB C to 4K@60HZ HDMI Multiport Adapter, 3 USB 3.0 Ports, SD/TF Card Reader, 100W PD, Desigend for MacBook Pro Air HP XPS and Other Type C Devices
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 19 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 🍀[𝟗-𝒊𝒏-𝟏 𝑼𝑺𝑩-𝑪 𝑯𝒖𝒃] Acodot Usb C Hub multiport adapter expands a single USB-C port to 9 ports (1 * HDMI 4K@60HZ, 3 * USB 3.0, 2 * USB 2.0, 1 * PD charging, 1 * TF card slot, 1 * SD card slot). Plug and play, no software, drivers or complicated installation required.

🖥️[𝟒𝑲@𝟔𝟎𝑯𝒁 𝑯𝑫𝑴𝑰 𝑼𝑯𝑫 𝑫𝒊𝒔𝒑𝒍𝒂𝒚] Mirror or extend your screen with the HDMI port to HD TV, monitor or projector. Support 4K@60Hz (down compatible with 2K@60Hz, 1080p, 1080i, 720p, 480p, ONLY when your devices support 4K resolution, the video output will be 4K.)

🏂[𝟓 𝑼𝑺𝑩 𝑷𝒐𝒓𝒕𝒔 & 𝑺𝑫/𝑻𝑭 𝑪𝒂𝒓𝒅𝒔 𝑹𝒆𝒂𝒅𝒆𝒓] Acodot Type c hub multiport adapter offers 3 USB 3.0 ports for fast transmission (super speed with data transfer up to 5Gbps). It takes only a few seconds to transfer photos or videos to your laptop.

📱[𝑾𝒊𝒅𝒆𝒍𝒚 𝑪𝒐𝒎𝒑𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒃𝒊𝒍𝒊𝒕𝒚] The Acodot USB c dongle supports almost all USB-C devices and thunderbolt 3 such as MacBook Pro, iMac / iMac Pro, iPad Pro, Google Chromebook Pixel, Huawei MateBook Pro, Dell, Surface Book2, Lenovo, Samsung, and many other Type C/USB C laptops(ONLY DP1.4). PS: The C port of the mobile phone needs to support USB3.1 Type C and DPALT mode.

🏃‍♂️[𝑴𝒂𝒙 𝟏𝟎𝟎𝑾 𝑷𝒐𝒘𝒆𝒓 𝑫𝒆𝒍𝒊𝒗𝒆𝒓𝒚] The multiport USB C hub adapter power delivery port supports up to 100W to keep your MacBook Pro or other compatible laptop. Worry-free 12-month warranty, If you encounter any problems, please contact us through the Amazon Message Center, and you will get support within 6 hrs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: One Hub Serves All Acodot (9-in-1) USB C Hub (Type-C Thunderbolt 3 compatible) is as powerful as a docking station to meet your needs. 9 ports usb c hub allow you to connect keyboard, mouse, usb flash driver, usb hard disks, etc. Aluminum alloy casing and reinforced TPE cable (withstand more than 10,000+ bends) offer extra durability for everyday use. 1 x HDMI output: 4K@60Hz (3840x2160@60Hz) 3 x USB3.0: Data transfer speed up to 5Gbps & Charging up to 5V at 0.9A 2 x USB2.0: Data transfer speed up to 480Mbps 1 x USB-C Port: Power Delivery up to 100W 1 x SD Card Slot: Speed up to 5Gbps, capacity up to 2TB 1 x TF Card Slot: Speed up to 5Gbps, capacity up to 2TB USB C hub multiport adapter plug and play, no software, drivers or complicated installation requiredExclusive multi-protection systems ensure over-current protection, over-voltage protection, short circuit protection and high-temperature protection.

USB-C hub MacBook Compatible device (partially listed): Laptop & Tablet： Apple MacBook Pro (2022/2021/2020/M1/M2,etc), MacBook Air (2022/2021/2020/M1/M2,etc), iMac 2019/2017/2016 or later, iMac Pro, Mac Mini, New MacBook with Thunderbolt 3, iPad Pro Samsung Chromebook Pro, Chromebook Plus, Notebook 9 13", Galaxy Book 12", Galaxy Book 10.6, Galaxy Tab Pro S 12", Samsung Tab S4 / S5e/ S6 or later Google Pixelbook, Chromebook Pixel or later Microsoft Surface Pro X, Surface Go, Surface Book 2, Surface Pro 7, Surface Laptop 3, Microsoft Lumia 950/950 XL or later DELL XPS 13, XPS 15, XPS12 9250, Precision 5510, Inspiron 15 7000, Latitude 7285 or later Lenovo Yoga 920, 910, 720, ThinkPad X1, Ideapad Air 12, Miix 630 or later HP Spectre 13, Spectre X360, ENVY 13, ENVY X360, HP EliteBook Folio G1 or later Huawei MateBook X Pro, MateBook X, Huawei MateBook E or later ASUS Chromebook Flip, ZenBook3, ASUS ZenBook Pro, Asus or later ZenBook Flip, ASUS Transformer 3 Pro T303UA or later Xiaomi Mi Notebook Air 12.5/13.3, Mi Notebook Pro 15.6 ", and more USB Type C OTG Smartphone： Samsung Galaxy S22 / S21 / S20 / S10 / S10 + / S10E/ S9 / S9 + / S8 / S8 + / Note 10 +/ Note 10 / Note 9 / Note 8 or later Huawei Mate 50, Mate 40, Mate 30, Mate 20, Mate 20 Pro, Mate 20 X, Mate 10, Mate 10 Pro, P30, P30 Pro, P20, P20 Pro, Honor View 20, View 10, Note 10 or later HTC One U11 / 10, BlackBerry DTEK60, Oneplus 7 Pro, and more or later PS: Display port needs to support DP1.4 resolutionThe C port of the mobile phone needs to support USB3.1 Type C and DPALT mode.

Enjoy New Video Experience This USB C MacBook Adapter Dongle 's HDMI Support Extend Mode and Mirror Mode. No driver Needed, Plug And Play. 3*USB 3.0 Fast Transmission Your time-saving companion, The USB C to USB hub with 3 ports Super Speed USB 3.0 support up to 5Gbps (640Mb/s), 1G file transfer is less than 2.9 seconds. SD Card Universal Compatibility The SD and microSD card slots support 5Gbps read and write, capacity up to 2TB. Compatible with SD, SDHC, SDXC, MicroSD, MicroSDHC, Micro SDXC cards, perfect companion for seamless access to photos and other media files.

Light Weight With compact and portable design, whether on business or travel, you can take it on the go, plug and play. Powerful Pass-Through Charging Connect a Power Delivery charger to the USB-C port to give your laptop a continuous charge up to 100W while transferring files or streaming media. Superior Heat Dissipation USB-C to hdmi hub with build-in newest smart chips and upgrade high-density aluminum alloy, more effective heat dissipation to protect your devices.

Enjoy Amazing Visual Feast- 4K@60hz HDMI Output : mirror or extend your laptop/smartphone screen with HDMI port Warm Tips: 1. PD Port is only for charging, not support Data transfer. 2. SD card and TF/Micro SD card cannot read data simultaneously. 3. Please make sure that the USB-C(Type C) interface of your device supports the function of charging, video and data transfer. 4. Not suitable for pass-through charging tablets (such as iPad Pro) or phones when using the original wall charger. To support full-speed charging for iPad Pro, please check if the adapter supports 15V (45W). Supported Systems: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista, XP, Mac OS X 10.6 or later, Linux 2.6.14 or later, iPad OS Incompatible Devices: Nintendo Switch, USB SuperDrive, Original XPS 13 stock adapter Package Contents: 1*USB C Hub 1*User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer! Five Stars for the USB-C Hub!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the "USB-C Hub" from Amazon, and I must say, it has been an absolute game-changer for my tech setup! This little device has transformed the way I use my laptop, and I cannot recommend it enough. Here are the reasons why it deserves a solid five-star rating:Versatility: This USB-C hub is a powerhouse of connectivity. With multiple USB ports, HDMI, Ethernet, SD card slots, and more, it has everything I need to connect all my peripherals and accessories effortlessly. It's like having a complete docking station in my pocket!Seamless Performance: I was concerned about potential lags or data transfer issues, but this hub has proved to be remarkably efficient. My external hard drives, keyboard, mouse, and other devices all work flawlessly without any hiccups. Data transfer speeds are impressive too!Sleek Design: The USB-C Hub boasts a sleek and compact design, making it easy to carry around wherever I go. Its premium build quality feels sturdy and durable, ensuring it withstands the rigors of daily use.Plug and Play: One of the most convenient features is the plug-and-play functionality. No drivers or complicated setup required – I just plug it into my laptop's USB-C port, and it's ready to use instantly. This has saved me so much time and frustration.Perfect Travel Companion: As someone who travels frequently for work, this USB-C Hub has become my trusty travel companion. It declutters my workspace and allows me to connect to various peripherals at hotels or coworking spaces without any issues.Overall, the "USB-C Hub" has exceeded my expectations, and I can confidently say it's worth every penny. Whether you're a student, professional, or a tech-savvy individual, this hub will undoubtedly enhance your productivity and connectivity. I'm thrilled with my purchase and can't imagine using my laptop without it anymore.Kudos to the creators for engineering such a fantastic product. If you're looking to expand your laptop's capabilities and streamline your workflow, do yourself a favor and invest in this USB-C Hub. It's a five-star addition to any tech setup!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and Dependable
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a similar product to this about a year ago. It worked ok for a while but the slots didn't secure the USB's good enough, so my laptop would have a hard time recognizing them. That's not a problem with this one. Another plus is it has an SD card reader, HDMI slot, and 5 USB ports (three 3.0 lightning ports and two 2.0 ports). You can't go wrong with this purchase. Well worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Acodot USB AIO
reviews.reviewText: Using this product to handle SD cards management and for charging multiple devices via its power delivery USB-C port. I purchased an Anker 100W charger with USB-C connector to plug into this Acodot AIO hub. I've had five USB devices hooked up for charging simultaneously and all charged up faster than each with their respective chargers! Speaking of chargers, this little hub alleviates the need to have to all of them plugged into various wall outlets or slots on a surge protector. One and done. It has x3 3.0 USB ports and x2 2.0 ports for legacy devices. When powered through charger, devices charge if there's a battery and data passes with flash drives for example with no problems. It can hybrid between them, which is especially handy if you're working with data and charging devices at the same time. Built in card reader is nice too! Great data speeds (read/write) too. Wish it had a RJ-45 Ethernet port, but this is a budget hub and it goes with the territory in its being missing. Overall, this is a quality device and I'd certainly tell anyone sitting on the fence about buying one to go ahead and buy it. Did a lot of poring over specs and what-not and this one met my criteria: (1) Windows and Linux/Android compatible; (2) USB-C connection; (3) Capable of powered charging from 100W charger; (4) SD card reader functionality. The fact it has HDMI is a bonus. I'm not much of a traveller, but I would imagine (if I were) that having the option to setup a second monitor on my mobile device capable of it (tv in hotel room, for example) via HDMI would be quite nice to have as an option. Theoretically, one could probably use one of these with a HTPC or mini-pc setup with a HDMI to whatever-audio-source converter box to handle surround sound, plus you'd have storage options via flash drives for your media. Could have a load of batocera linux on a bootable flash drive for some retro gaming with a wireless controller... oh the possibilities!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The SD card reader did not work on my phone but everything else was great. The card reader does work on my laptop but does not exceed 20MB/s where my other reader reaches 100MB/s easily. Otherwise this is a great USB hub with USB-PD passthrough. I used this device connected to my Android phone with an external USB 3 2TB NVMe and another USB 3 SD Card reader to transfer video to the 2TB drive without a computer. Works amazingly well and the build quality is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect inexpensive port adapter for mac
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this port extender for a new mac air book and it worked perfectly. All port types were attached with no configuration issues at all. Perfect for a mac novice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for everything on iPad pro
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried a couple of these and they wouldn’t charge the iPad when used to run the charger thru. This one works great for using usb drives or accessories and the hdmi is great for traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to work with, Plug and play
reviews.reviewText: Is a very useful tool, you can add several peripherals and works just fine, as long as you have an item that either has self drivers or the driver can be downloaded so it can remember it, the HDMI works well, I would not say 4k, is mostly powered by your video graphics card or processor, I haven’t tried the 4k, then again I don’t need it,The only way I can explain how this unit works, years ago I always connected my laptop to a docking station and everything worked, well, kind of works just like that, one connection and everything else is ready to goHighly recommend

reviews.reviewTitle: Convierte mi tablet en una computadora completa
reviews.reviewText: Lo uso en conjunto a mi Galaxy Tab S9 y le agrega todos los puertos que necesito para los usos que le doy. Me encanto el color azul que compre y la calidad de ensamble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Perfect USB C Hub, 9 in 1 USB C, I love hubs as they make my lifer easier, so you don’t have to connect everything to the pc at once.This hub is lightweight, small size can fit in small bags, and nice stylish surface finish.This hub provides 9 ports including: 2 x USB type 2.0, 3 x USB 3.0, 1 x HDMI port, and more.The HDMI provides a clear and good quality imagine.Easy to use no software download required just plug and use.Very satisfied!

MacBookProは本体に端子が多いのですが、結構外に持ち歩くことが多いのでワンケーブルの接続で全て接続できてしまうこの手のHUBをよく使ってます。今まで使っていたのは４年前くらいに購入したもので、値段も倍以上したうえに長時間使ってると結構熱くなってて買い替えを検討してました。長時間使ってもさほど熱くなく端子数も増えた上で（セールとはいえ）値段が半額以下まで下がってました。ちなみに今みたらクーポン入れるとセール時よりも安いという、、。この手の商品が安くなったのはありがたいですが、デスクにおいても見栄えのするドッキングステーションにしようとすると急に値段が２万とか３万とかになるので、端子数を増やしたり価格競争ではなくケースをもう少し大きく見栄え良くするとかの方向で競争してもらったら嬉しいです。それでいて１万円以下ならたぶん売れると思いますよ。

reviews.reviewTitle: Good product with some design flaws.
reviews.reviewText: It's a good product. It seems to be of good quality material, not flimsy plastic. The biggest drawback if the output cable attached to it. The output cable should be a detachable wire, so that you can replace as needed. I am pretty sure this wire might break off even though the overall product will be in best shape.

reviews.reviewerName: No sirve, tiene falso contacto y desconecta los dispositivos.
reviews.reviewText: Tiene falso contacto en todos sus puertos y desconecta los dispositivos… creo recomendado
